package.name: connman-gtk
package.install:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make install #sed -i 's%Exec=connman-gtk%Exec=connman-gtk-wrapper%g' /usr/share/applications/connman-gtk.desktop #sed -i 's%Categories=GTK%Categories=Network;GTK%g' /usr/share/applications/connman-gtk.desktop
echo -n '' > /usr/bin/connman-gtk-wrapper cat >> /usr/bin/connman-gtk-wrapper << CMRUN #!/bin/sh
PATH=/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:\$PATH export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
[ "\$security" '!=' "smack" ] && exec /usr/bin/connman-gtk exec sudo /usr/bin/connman-gtk
CMRUN
cat > /usr/share/applications/connman-gtk.desktop << CMDESK [Desktop Entry] Type=Application Exec=connman-gtk-wrapper Name=Connman Settings Name[fi_FI]=Connman-Asetukset Name[de_DE]=Netzwerk einrichten Categories=Network;GTK;GNOME;Settings;X-GNOME-Settings-Panel;X-Unity-Settings-Panel;HardwareSettings X-GNOME-Settings-Panel=connman-gtk X-Unity-Settings-Panel=connman-gtk Icon=preferences-system-network
CMDESK
chmod 0755 /usr/bin/connman-gtk-wrapper
